author: Nick Daino
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
description: Fetches upcoming NFL game schedules from PlainTextSports and displays them in Discord embeds.
install_msg: Thanks for installing NFLGames! Use `[p]nfl` to see upcoming NFL games. Make sure you have aiohttp and beautifulsoup4 installed: `pip install aiohttp beautifulsoup4`
short: Shows upcoming NFL games from PlainTextSports
